thread.title: Thursday’s Travel News: Alaska Airlines; New Service to Orlando
thread.title_full: Thursday’s Travel News: Alaska Airlines; New Service to Orlando - The New York Times

author: Shivani Vora
title: Thursday’s Travel News: Alaska Airlines; New Service to Orlando
text:
Our weekday morning digest that includes consumer news, deals, tips and anything else that travelers may want to know.
ALASKA AIRLINES TEAMS UP WITH CHINA’S HAINAN AIRLINES
Alaska Airlines is partnering with the China-based Hainan Airlines . As of today, members of Alaska Airlines Mileage Plan and Hainan Airlines Fortune Wings Club can start earning miles on both carriers. To kick off the partnerships, members will earn double miles through Oct. 31. Hainan Airlines flies to more than 90 destinations including nonstop flights between Beijing and Shanghai to Seattle. Alaska Airlines, which is based in Seattle, serves more than a 100 cities in the United States, Canada and Mexico.
SPECIAL FARE TO PARIS ON LA COMPAGNIE
In Transit Travel news, deals and tips, written by the editors and reporters of the Travel section.
